title: Yorkshire puddings with pork filling
ingredients: ['Batter', '125 g (4½ oz) plain flour', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '½ tsp sweet paprika', '300 ml (10 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', 'Pork filling', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '300 g (10½ oz) lean minced pork', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 small leek, finely chopped', '1 carrot, finely chopped', '1 tbsp tomato purée', '1 tsp sweet chilli sauce', '4 tbsp vegetable stock', '1 tbsp chopped parsley', 'salt and pepper']
